actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that the President and the United States delegation to the 1977 Belgrade Review Conference should urge the Government of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics to grant exit visas to each member of the Smeliansky family.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the President and the United States delegation urge the Soviet Union to grant visas to the Smeliansky family to emigrate to Israel.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that the President and the United States delegation to the 1977 Belgrade Review Conference should urge the Government of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics to grant exit visas to each member of the Smeliansky family.
